title: #449 That Chappelle Movie (Solocast)
itunes:title: That Chappelle Movie (Solocast)
description:
I attended skateboarder and standup comedian Dave Chappelle’s screening of his movie at Madison Square Garden. And MAN! What a show. I really thought it was just going to be a movie screening. But why would I expect that for $100+ per ticket? No, Chappelle put on a show. Comedians, musicians, Jeff Ross. Folks!

I wish you all could’ve been there. It was a really fun night. Please make sure to watch Dave Chappelle on Netflix today. He needs the views. And also watch my special on Netflix, Double Negative. It’s not 2 specials like Dave’s, it’s a double special. 

For more Ari:

Tour Dates

 Patreon

Merch

Instagram

The Music:

Tobe Nwigwe- I'M DOPE

H.E.R ft. Daniel Caesar- Best Part

Thank you to our sponsors! Go to BetterHelp.com/Ari for 10% off your first month and head to 3Chi.com and use code "Skeptic" for 5% off Delt 8 products!
